10470.「な～んだい アンタ。\n 人んちに 勝手に上がり込んできてさ～。\n 押し売り:
Whats'a matta wit' you? Ya just barge into
people's house's wit'out permission? If ya
tryin' ta sell me somethin', get outta here!

10472.「破邪舟使いの末裔 フルッカじゃな？\n わしは 賢者ホーローじゃ。\n そなた:

aren't ye? The name's Hollow, and I've

10473.「え？ フルッカは あたしだけど。\n 今どき 破邪舟使いって……。:

10474.「単刀直入に言おう。冥王の心臓に行くため\n おぬしのチカラが必要じゃ。\n わ:

10475.「はぁ？ 冥王の心臓？ なによそれ。\n それに破邪舟の術なんて あたしゃ使えな:

10476.「なに？ おぬしは 使えないのか。\n ならば 誰が使える？\n 破邪舟の術は:

10477.「今は 誰も使えないわよ～。\n そもそも 父ちゃんが 使えなかったしね～。: Now no one can use it. Not even my dad could.

10478.「つまり そんな術 どこにもないってワケ。\n 破邪舟使いの一族なんて肩書きも\:

10480.「破邪舟の術は 歴史の中から\n 消えてしまったというのか……。\n う～む 万:
The technique of sailin' The Sacred Ship has

10482.「おお そうか！ そういうことか！\n わしの連れ合いは このことまで\n ちゃ:

10493.「ふふ。おまえの ものぐさな根性も\n <pc>が 過去を変えたついでに\n 変:

10494.「ネルゲルの手に落ちた エテーネの村では\n 何が起こるか わからんからのう。\:

10505.「輝ける破邪舟は 時の海を渡り\n 救世主 大いなる闇を 越える……\n とな。:

now overwhelms the light of this world.

10840.<center> このままでは レンダーシアはおろか\n 世界のすべてが いずれ:
If this continues, not only Lendersia, but
the entire world will forever be sealed by
darkness.

10841.<center> そして それを防ぐことができるのは \n エテーネの民の姿を:
And the only one who can prevent it is
<pc>...you...who has regained the
appearance of the people of Ethene.

10842.<center> あなたは いにしえのエテーネの民の血を\n もっとも強く 受け:
You are the strongest heir in Ethene's
bloodline. This power can be used to change
the course of history itself.

10843.<center> ネルゲルも それを恐れるが故に\n エテーネの村と エテーネの:
Nergel most likely knew this, and fearing
this power, destroyed your home and your
people.

10844.<center> 今こそ 希望の芽の息吹くとき。:
Now, it is time for the seeds of hope to
sprout.

10845.<center> あなた方が 大地の箱舟と呼ぶ 乗り物。\n あれこそは かつて:
The vehicle that you call Ark of the Earth is
actually the reincarnated form of a mysterious
entity known as the Starflight Express.

10846.<center> 私に近しい存在である かの箱舟が\n 時渡りのチカラを持つ あ:
The Ark in its current form has the ability
to cross through time...

10847.<center> あるべき時代へと 導いてくれるでしょう。: ...to the era that you must visit.

10849.<center> 今 かけた魔法によって あなたは\n 人間の姿 プクリポの姿:
The magic I have cast on you will make you
appear no differently to others, regardless if
you are a human or a Pukulipo.

10850.<center> これで あなたのことを知る人々が\n あなたが 姿を変えること:
This ensures that those who already know you
will not be confused by your change in outward
appearance.

10851.<center> 過去への旅の準備は ととのいました。\n さあ そろそろ お戻:
You are now ready for your journey to the
past. I shall return you from whence you
came, <pc> of Ethene.

10853.「……ファ～～。\n 話が長すぎて 思わず 寝ちゃったよ。:
..Ahhh. The story was too long, so it put me
to sleep!

10854.「……んで そのカオからすると キミ\n 次にやるべきことが わかったみたいだね:
...and by the look on your face, you already
know what you gotta do.

10855.「うん。目的があるのは いいことよね。\n アタシも 生きてたころには\n そり:
Yeah. It's good to have a purpose in life,
isn't it? When I was still around, I had big
dreams, too.

10856.「……ああっ そーよ！\n 変身できるんだから アタシの夢は\n キミにかなえて:
Oh, yeah! Since you can change forms now,
why don't I just let you make my dreams come
true...?

10857.「……あ～ でもな～。\n いくら アタシの姿を使えるからって\n こればっかり:
Oh, but... no matter how much you use my
amazing looks, there's not much you can do
about it.

10858.「お笑いスピリッツとは 心に宿るもの！\n ひとつの笑いを 取るためだけに\n:
The spirit of comedy lies deep in our hearts!
A true golden spirit that'll throw it all away
just to get a single laugh!

10859.「もし キミが その精神の持ち主なら\n 迷わず 頼むんだけどな～。\n ……う:
If you had that kind of spirit, then I
wouldn't hesitate to ask you.
....buuut, you seem to have the potential.

10860.「……まあ いいや。\n とりあえず キミは キミの夢を追えばいいよ！:
Ah, well...
For now, you should focus on your
own dreams!

10861.「じゃあね。エテーネ村の <pc>。\n キミが ネルゲル倒して レンダーシアを:
See ya later, <pc> of Ethene
Village. I hope you'll pulverize that Nergel
and bring smiles back to Lendersia!

10862.「おおっ おぬしは……？\n <pc>！ <pc>なのか！？: Oh, can it be...? <pc>, is that you?!

10863.「そうか その姿が……！: So that's what ya look like...!

10864.「うむうむ。\n いかにも おぬしらしい キャッチーで\n グッドルッキンな面構:
Mm-hmm. Ya' have a catchy and good-lookin'
face, just like me.

10865.「よし。それでは むこうで 何があったか\n くわしく 話してくれるかな？:
All right. Now, will ya tell us what happened
over there in detail?

10866.「……そうか。アバのやつに会ってきたか。\n 死してなお おぬしを見守っておると:
I see ya met Abba. That she still
watches over ya even in death... what a woman
ta look up to.

10867.「そして 自分の真の姿を取り戻したのち\n 光の神殿で 不思議な声から\n 助言:
And ya say that after ya regained yer true
identity, ya received advice from a
mysterious voice in the Temple of Light...

10868.「ならば まちがいない。その声の導きどおり\n 人間の姿で 大地の箱舟……列車に:
That settles it. If we follow the voice's guidance and take the Ark of the Earth, we should be able to travel to the time when
the Sacred Ship was lost.

10869.「じつはな おぬしをエテーネの村に送ったあと\n わしも この家にある書物を読み:
I have ta tell you that after I sent ya to Ethene, I also read some of the books in here ta find out more about that Sacred
Ship.

10870.「こんな大事なモノを 読まずに\n ほこりを かぶらせておくとは\n フルッカに:
Can't say I'm surprised at Fluka fer'
leavin' such an important item in the dust
without readin' it.

10871.「この書には グレンの歴史が書かれていてな。\n 破邪舟という記述が 消えたのは:
This book contains the history of Glen.
The description of the ship has been
missing for about 500 years now.

10872.「でな。気になるのは このページじゃ。: So...what I'm interested in is this page.

10873.「ちょうど それと同じ時代\n 空前の大災害があったと 記されておる。:
It is written that there was an unprecedented
catastrophe at the same time.

10874.「大災害は その時代に生きる者が\n チカラをあわせ なんとかしたようじゃが\n:
It seems that the people livin' in that time period managed to cope with the catastrophe by joining forces, but for some reason the Sacred
Ship has disappeared.

10875.「よいか？ おぬしのなすべきことは\n 破邪舟の術が 途絶えた原因をつきとめ\n:
Got it? What ya must do is find out why the
technique of the Sacred Ship was lost and
make sure it's handed down to the present day.

10876.「未知なる 過去への旅……。\n 長い道のりになるかもしれんが\n 自分の使命を:
A journey to the unknown past. It may be a
long road ahead, but never forget yer
mission.

10877.「冥王の心臓に たどりつくためには\n 破邪舟のチカラを 借りるほかないのじゃ。:
In order to reach Hades' Heart,
we have no choice but ta use the Sacred Ship.
I'm countin' on ya, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>!

10878.「おや？ どうした <pc>。\n おぬしの なすべきことを\n 忘れてしまった:
Hmm? What's the matter, <pc>? Have
ya forgotten what yer supposed to do?

10879.「おぬしのなすべきことは 過去へ行き\n 破邪舟の術が 途絶えた原因をつきとめ\:
What ya must do is find out why the
technique of the Sacred Ship was lost and make
sure it's handed down to the present day.

10880.「人間の姿で 大地の箱舟……列車に乗れば\n 破邪舟の失われた時代に\n 行くこ:
Using the Ark of the Earth in your human form
would take us to the lost era of the Sacred
Ship.

10881.「冥王の心臓に たどりつくためには\n 破邪舟のチカラを 借りるほかないのじゃ。:
In order to reach Hades' Heart,
we have no choice but ta use the Sacred Ship.
I'm really countin' on ya, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>!

32273.「ようやく お前に\n このことを 話せる日が来た……。:
The day has finally come when I can tell you
about this...

32274.「その者は 時渡りの術で \n 遠き未来より 過去に飛ばされ\n 滅びの運命を逃:
That person was sent back far into the past to
escape Ethene's doomed fate...

32275.「お前たちの成長を見守りながら わしは\n かつて 錬金術師が語った 滅びの運命:
As I watched you two grow, I eventually
realized the doom that alchemist spoke of
was soon approaching.
